verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
The Lord liveth
And blessed be my rock
And let the God
Of my salvation be exalted
The Lord liveth
And blessed be my Rock
And let the God
Of my salvation be exalted

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Therefore will I give thanks
Unto Thee oh Lord
Among the nations
And sing praises to Thy name
The Lord liveth
And blessed be my Rock
And let the God
Of my salvation be exalted
